name: Sunflex UK
description:
Specialists in bi fold doors in aluminium timber and composite timber/aluminium.  Our Sunflex German systems offer the slimmest profiles, unrivalled thermal efficiency and weather performance.  We have been supplying our systems throughout the UK since 2000.

We also manufacture aluminium sliding doors, windows, glass roofs and glass balustrades.
address:

Diamond Road
Norwich
